turns.content: What is 360 degree view of customer

A 360 degree view of the customer refers to a comprehensive, all-encompassing understanding of a customer's behavior, preferences, needs, and interactions with a company across all touchpoints and channels. It is a holistic approach to customer understanding that takes into account every aspect of the customer's journey with the company, including their history of purchases, interactions with customer service representatives, online behavior, social media activity, and more.

The goal of a 360 degree view of the customer is to create a single, unified view of the customer that can be used by all teams within the organization, from marketing and sales to customer service and product development. This allows companies to deliver personalized, relevant experiences to customers at every stage of the customer journey, which can lead to increased loyalty, higher customer satisfaction, and ultimately, increased revenue.
A 360 degree view of the customer is a comprehensive understanding of a customer's interactions, preferences, and behavior with a company across all touchpoints and channels.
